Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the city of Yonkers to impose an additional one-half of one percent sales tax
Summary: Authorizes the city of Yonkers to impose an additional one-half of one percent sales tax to be used for the support of education.
LawCode: Amd ยง1210, Tax L; amd ยง7, Chap 67 of 2015
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the city of Yonkers to impose additional sales tax; to amend chapter 67 of the laws of 2015, amending the tax law relating to authorizing the city of Yonkers to impose additional sales tax, in relation to extending provisions relating thereto
